more_info.origin: A natural polysaccharide, produced by the bacterium Pseudomonas elodea from starch.
more_info.side_effects: None known in the concentrations used, although high concentrations bring about flatulence and bloating, due to fermentation by the intestinal microflora (in the same way as all indigestible polysaccharides). It has laxative properties.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: Gellan gum can be used by all religious groups, vegans and vegetarians.
